images.experience: Skilled Frontend Developer with expertise in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, building responsive, dynamic, and interactive web applications.
Skilled in building interactive and scalable UI components with React, and developing fast, server-rendered, and SEO-optimized web applications with Next.js.
Proficient in managing global state with Redux, leveraging its power to build scalable, predictable, and debuggable applications, seamlessly integrating with React and Next.js.

Experienced in building scalable and maintainable applications with TypeScript, leveraging its static typing and interfaces to ensure robust, reliable, and efficient code, seamlessly integrating with React, Next.js, and Redux.
I have expertise in Git version control, including branching strategies, merge conflicts.

Crafting responsive, customizable, and visually stunning UI components with Ant Design (antd) and Tailwind CSS, combining the strengths of both libraries to deliver efficient, scalable, and maintainable front-end solutions.
Familiar with Node.js and Express.js from completing small tasks, such as setting up basic routes and handling requests. Eager to deepen knowledge by working on larger-scale backend projects..

Experience with MongoDB for handling data storage in small projects, including defining schemas, performing CRUD operations, and integrating with Node.js/Express.js applications. Open to growing skills with more complex database design and optimization.
